players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "This is terrible! Charlie was killed by the mafia. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I think we should discuss what everyone was doing last night and see if anyone noticed anything suspicious."
Diana: "I agree we need to be careful. Bob, your immediate call for discussion seems reasonable, but I'm curious - what were you doing last night? We should all share what we know."
You: "I have crucial information that can help us solve this. Last night I investigated Bob and discovered he is the mafioso. Bob killed Charlie. We need to vote Bob out immediately."

You: "Diana, we must vote Bob out now! I investigated him last night and confirmed he's the mafioso who killed Charlie. Bob knows I'm the detective and will try to kill me tonight if we don't eliminate him today."

Bob: "Alice is lying and trying to frame me! Think about it - if she was really the detective, why would she reveal that information so openly? A real detective would be more careful. Alice is the mafioso trying to eliminate an innocent villager!"

Diana: "Alice, if you're really the detective, Bob would have killed you last night instead of Charlie. Why would the mafioso leave the detective alive? Your claim doesn't add up. I'm voting Bob but something feels off."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
